parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: chunk_size

param_schema.title: Chunk Size
param_schema.description: Number of frames to generate in each processing chunk

parameters.description: Number of frames to generate in each processing chunk

parameters.name: resolution

param_schema.title: Resolution
param_schema.description: Height of the output video in pixels. Width is automatically calculated.

parameters.description: Height of the output video in pixels. Width is automatically calculated.

parameters.name: motion_video

param_schema.title: Motion Video
param_schema.description: Reference video file containing the motion to be mimicked

parameters.description: Reference video file containing the motion to be mimicked

parameters.name: sample_stride

param_schema.title: Sample Stride
param_schema.description: Interval for sampling frames from the reference video. Higher values skip more frames.

parameters.description: Interval for sampling frames from the reference video. Higher values skip more frames.

parameters.name: frames_overlap

param_schema.title: Frames Overlap
param_schema.description: Number of overlapping frames between chunks for smoother transitions

parameters.description: Number of overlapping frames between chunks for smoother transitions

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: Strength of guidance towards the reference. Higher values adhere more closely to the reference but may reduce creativity.

parameters.description: Strength of guidance towards the reference. Higher values adhere more closely to the reference but may reduce creativity.

parameters.name: noise_strength

param_schema.title: Noise Strength
param_schema.description: Strength of noise augmentation. Higher values add more variation but may reduce coherence with the reference.

parameters.description: Strength of noise augmentation. Higher values add more variation but may reduce coherence with the reference.

parameters.name: denoising_steps

param_schema.title: Denoising Steps
param_schema.description: Number of denoising steps in the diffusion process. More steps can improve quality but increase processing time.

parameters.description: Number of denoising steps in the diffusion process. More steps can improve quality but increase processing time.

parameters.name: appearance_image

param_schema.title: Appearance Image
param_schema.description: Reference image file for the appearance of the generated video

parameters.description: Reference image file for the appearance of the generated video

parameters.name: checkpoint_version

param_schema.description: Choose the checkpoint version to use

parameters.description: Choose the checkpoint version to use

parameters.name: output_frames_per_second

param_schema.title: Output Frames Per Second
param_schema.description: Frames per second of the output video. Affects playback speed.

parameters.description: Frames per second of the output video. Affects playback speed.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Number of frames to generate in each processing chunk

resolution.description: Height of the output video in pixels. Width is automatically calculated.

motion_video.title: Motion Video
motion_video.description: Reference video file containing the motion to be mimicked

sample_stride.description: Interval for sampling frames from the reference video. Higher values skip more frames.

frames_overlap.title: Frames Overlap
frames_overlap.description: Number of overlapping frames between chunks for smoother transitions

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: Strength of guidance towards the reference. Higher values adhere more closely to the reference but may reduce creativity.

noise_strength.title: Noise Strength
noise_strength.description: Strength of noise augmentation. Higher values add more variation but may reduce coherence with the reference.

denoising_steps.title: Denoising Steps
denoising_steps.description: Number of denoising steps in the diffusion process. More steps can improve quality but increase processing time.

appearance_image.title: Appearance Image
appearance_image.description: Reference image file for the appearance of the generated video

output_frames_per_second.description: Frames per second of the output video. Affects playback speed.
